alert.note: Alert for Jones; Lyman (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 4:23PM MDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Jones and northwestern Lyman Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 523 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Vivian, or 18 miles northwest of Presho, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Jones and northwestern Lyman Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
